posts.title: Canada Covid-19 Data
posts.description: Charts display the current data regarding Covid-19 cases in Canada. Covid-19 data is updated daily.

posts.title: Canada Employment Data
posts.description: Charts display the current data regarding emplyoment numbers in Canada. Data is updated monthly. Data type is seasonally adjusted and includes the age group of 15 years and over.

posts.title: Canada Undergraduate Tuition Data
posts.description: Charts display the current data regarding undergraduate tuition fees in Canada. Data is updated yearly.
